casebody.data:
Kody O. SAULMON, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 80688 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: September 11, 2018
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied October 23, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied December 18, 2018 Susan Hogan, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Shaun Mackelprang, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division One: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Cynthia L. Martin, and Gary D. Witt, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Kody O. Saulmon appeals from the Jackson County Circuit Court judgment denying a 24.035 post-conviction motion after an evidentiary hearing. Mr. Saulmon pleaded guilty to voluntary manslaughter and was sentenced to ten years in prison, to run consecutively to two concurrent fifteen-year sentences for robbery in the second degree. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, the judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 84.16(b).
